column2: MUST be a local resident of the CITY with a Permanant Address. ?? After Selection you will be on probation for a minumum of 6 months before confirmation. ?? Its a field job,  extensive travelling within the city required. Must be willing to travel out of town as and when required. Good TA- DA package given. ?? You will also be responsible for Marketing & Demostration of our softwares,  as well as post sale complaints and related customer support if reqd. ??
